put.mlc.classifiers.pcc.inference

Class Inference

  • java.lang.Object
    • put.mlc.classifiers.pcc.inference.Inference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IInference
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DepthFirstExplorationInference, ExhaustiveInference, MonteCarloInference

    public abstract class Inference
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInference, java.io.Serializable
    Root class for all inference methods in PCC.
    Author:
    Adrian Jaroszewicz, Arkadiusz Jachnik
    See Also:
